C and system (POSIX) functions used
[IPDR system overview]

The following standard C functions are used throughout the code:
     abort
     abs
     atoi
     atol
     fclose
     fflush
     fgets
     fopen
     fprintf
     fread
     free
     fwrite
     malloc
     memcpy
     memset
     printf
     snprintf
     sprintf
     sscanf
     strchr
     strcmp
     strcpy
     strerror
     strlen
     strncmp
     strncpy
     strtod
     strtok
     strtol
     strtoll
     strtoul
     strtoull
     vsnprintf
     vsprintf

Some of the following are used by the GenericCMPlatform.h abstraction and are confined to GenericCMPlatform.c. (This is for a POSIX implementation; VxWorks and other operating systems are slightly different).
     accept
     bind
     clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, ...)
     close
     connect
     fcntl
     getsockopt
     gettimeofday
     listen
     localtime_r
     poll
     pthread_create
     pthread_equal
     pthread_mutex_destroyy
     pthread_mutex_init
     pthread_mutex_lock
     pthread_mutex_unlock
     pthread_self
     pthread_sigmask
     recv
     recvfrom
     select
     send
     sendto
     setsockopt
     shutdown
     sigaddset
     sigemptyset
     sleep
     socket
     stat
